title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny Final Plus: The Chosen Future
title_en: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny Final Plus: The Chosen Future
title_jp: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED DESTINY FINAL PLUS 『選ばれた未来』
synopsis: A remake of the final episode of Gundam Seed Destiny, with added scenes and minor changes. Also includes an after war epilogue. What lies ahead in the future of the Cosmic Era?
